rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with natural light and a welcoming space. Adheres to Vastu principles by aligning entry towards the north.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open living area with eco-friendly design elements such as energy-efficient windows, natural ventilation, and sustainable materials. South-east orientation to balance light and warmth.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with ample space for dining, designed following Vastu guidelines ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated with eco-friendly features like solar panels and water-saving fixtures. Placed in the east to harness morning light.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Conveniently located near the entrance for guests, designed with energy-efficient fixtures and natural ventilation.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring proper ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with east-facing windows to promote waking up naturally. Incorporates energy-efficient lighting and insulation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom, designed with eco-friendly materials and south-west orientation for balanced light and temperature.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom ensuring comfort and privacy. Uses sustainable construction practices.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom, designed with energy-efficient solutions in mind.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space on the upper level, offering a quiet reading area. Utilizes natural light from north-facing windows for an optimal environment.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: Functional study area designed to accommodate work and leisure, integrating eco-friendly design principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Master)
rooms.description: Private bathroom for the master bedroom with sustainable fixtures.

openings.description: North-facing window ensuring optimal natural light while adhering to Vastu.
Eco-friendly staircase connecting the levels with minimal material usage and energy-efficient design.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Fifth bedroom, designed with sustainable features and proper orientation for balanced light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: Sixth bedroom offering ample space and eco-friendly design elements.

openings.location: west side, linking first floor to second floor
openings.description: Eco-conscious staircase using minimal materials and designed for safety.
Balcony providing outdoor space with energy-efficient design and natural ventilation.
